biotools.summary: MuSERA (Multiple Sample Enriched Region Assessment) is a broadly useful stand-alone tool for both interactive and batch analysis of combined evidence from enriched regions in multiple ChIP-seq or DNase-seq sample replicates, with a user-friendly graphical interface.

bioschemas.name: MuSERA
bioschemas.summary: MuSERA (Multiple Sample Enriched Region Assessment) is a broadly useful stand-alone tool for both interactive and batch analysis of combined evidence from enriched regions in multiple ChIP-seq or DNase-seq sample replicates, with a user-friendly graphical interface.
